shortdesc.ph: Sets the maximum number of streams that a user can receive in a specified audio reception range.

section.p: If the number of receivable streams exceeds the set value, the local user receives the maxCount streams that are closest to the local user. If there are users who belong to the same team as the local user in the room, the local user receives the audio of the teammates first. For example, when maxCount is set to 3, if there are five remote users in the room, two of whom belong to the same team as the local user, and three of whom belong to different teams but are within the audio reception range of the local user, the local user can hear the two teammates and the one user from a different team closest to the local user.
section.note:
因为服务端空间音效不发布，所以不能体现 enterRoom。You can call this method either before or after , with the following differences:
If you call this method before , this method takes effect when entering the room.
If you call this method after , this method takes effect immediately and changes the current maximum number of received streams of the local user.

plentry.pd: The maximum number of streams that a user can receive within a specified audio reception range.
